faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about VCoin

questions.question: What is VCoin?
questions.answer: VCoin is a utility token that powers our hybrid funding platform, connecting investors with entrepreneurs through transparent, blockchain-based investments.

questions.question: How can I participate?
questions.answer: You can participate by purchasing VCoin tokens during our presale or by investing in projects through our platform once it launches.

questions.question: What are the benefits?
questions.answer: Benefits include early access to promising startups, transparent investment tracking, global accessibility, and potential token appreciation.

questions.question: What is hybrid funding?
questions.answer: Hybrid funding combines traditional cash investments with VCoin tokens, providing flexibility for both investors and entrepreneurs.

questions.question: Is it secure?
questions.answer: Yes, our platform uses blockchain technology and smart contracts to ensure transparency, security, and immutable record-keeping.

questions.question: What types of projects?
questions.answer: We focus on innovative startups across various sectors including technology, sustainability, healthcare, and fintech.

footer.subtitle: Connecting entrepreneurs with investors through blockchain innovation

tokenomics.description: Reserved for ecosystem growth, user incentives, and platform development
Managed by the DAO for strategic initiatives and community governance
Team allocation with vesting schedule to ensure long-term commitment
Available for public purchase during the presale and launch phases
Strategic partnerships and business development initiatives

technicalCards.title: Blockchain

technicalCards.title: Governance
technicalCards.description: Decentralized governance with token holder voting

token.addressNotAvailable: Contract will be deployed before mainnet launch
token.contractAvailable: Contract details will be available after deployment

faq.question: Is VCoin inflationary?
faq.answer: No, VCoin has a fixed supply of 100 million tokens with no inflation mechanism.

faq.question: Can I stake VCoin?
faq.answer: Yes, staking will be available after mainnet launch with attractive APY rewards.

faq.question: What's the vesting schedule?
faq.answer: Team tokens have a 4-year vesting with 1-year cliff. Public sale tokens are immediately liquid.

faq.question: Is the contract upgradeable?
faq.answer: No, the VCoin contract is immutable to ensure security and decentralization.

disclaimer: VCoin is a utility token designed to facilitate interactions within our platform ecosystem.
This token is not intended as an investment vehicle or security.
Token value may fluctuate based on utility demand and market conditions.
Please carefully read our legal documentation before participating.
Regulatory compliance varies by jurisdiction - ensure you meet local requirements.
